@PaddlerPoet @FenitN @brooklynmarie @dtkeating Right, which is really my concern with COVID's mortality rate on a 7-10 year time horizon -- it causes damage to cardiac muscles and alveoli now, which in a few years turn in to COPD and congestive heart failure, and a few years later that kills you.
@Too_Big_To_Fail @FenitN @brooklynmarie @dtkeating And it's worth noting that HIV does not kill people by itself. Opportunistic secondary infections do.

@PaddlerPoet @FenitN @brooklynmarie @dtkeating I wasn't alive for the 1918 pandemic. I was alive for the AIDS crisis in the 80's. My expectations of how deadly pandemics play out are shaped by that.
